reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: UNWomen - Women's Political Empowerment in North Africa and Middle East

description.narrative: This regional programme managed by UNWomen's Arab States Division provides a mechanism through which UNWomen assists women in the Arab region to reposition themselves in the political and decision making space and contribute to shaping the future of their countries in the ongoing democratic transition while protecting their previous gains. The prime areas of focus are a) advancing women?s rights and gender responsive agenda in constitutional legal and institutional frameworks, b) promoting women?s particip ation in electoral processes both as candidates and as voters and c) influencing political parties service delivery organizations media and local government to promote gender equality in leadership and participation. The regional programme is made up of tw o components: a funding mechanism for country tailored initiatives along a set of service lines primarily aimed at strengthening women?s political participation and advancing gender equality in the transition period, and a technical knowledge hub on Arab w omen?s citizenship and political participation.
